= Introduction =

This proof of concept aims to study the Dock Widget in Qt.

= Current Status =

Finished.

= Details =

  * Use the QDockWidget to create docks.
  * In QMainWindow, use addDockWidget() method to add the dock widget.
  * For more info, see the Qt Dock Widget Example.
